name: Somewhere to Stay Backpackers
description:
Welcome to Somewhere to Stay Backpackers, right in the lively West End of Brisbane! You’ll be surrounded by tons of budget-friendly cafes, bars, and restaurants, and just a short walk to City Beach at South Bank and the Brisbane CBD. Your adventure starts right here!

Our laid-back Queenslander house is like a resort with its beautiful gardens, big pool, and cool verandas. Chill out, enjoy a meal or drink, and take in the best city views in Brisbane. The pool and garden area come with lounge chairs, hammocks, outdoor games, and of course, plenty of sunshine.

We’re just a 5-minute walk from West End’s cultural hub, packed with over 100 cafes, cheap eats, bars, and clubs. Plus, don’t miss the West End Markets every Saturday for a taste of local flavours and unique finds!

We love bringing people together, and that’s why we host a variety of free events at our hostel! Join us for fun activities like Paint n Sip, free pizza nights, BBQs, Mario Kart tournaments, trivia nights, and much more. We believe we’re not just a place to stay; we’re a vibrant community where new friends are made and unforgettable memories are created.

We offer a range of comfy rooms, from singles and doubles to twins and dorms, with many featuring ensuites. If you’re booking multiple dorm beds close to your stay (1-3 days in advance), we can’t promise you’ll all be in the same room, so let us know right after booking and we’ll try to keep your group together.

Arriving after midnight? No worries — just give us a heads-up so we can arrange for a night manager to check you in. We also have paid parking on-site, so contact us to secure a spot. Enjoy free unlimited Wi-Fi, free coffee and tea, and a free shuttle bus (subject to availability).

We mainly welcome international travellers and students. Australian residents can stay too, but only for a week, and dorms are reserved for international guests only.

International guests are required to provide a valid PASSPORT as identification and credit card details at check-in. Australian residents are required to provide valid photo identification and credit card details at check-in.

Somewhere To Stay Backpackers Hostel will not accept any guests under the age of 18.

Come on over and make yourself at home — your new home away from home awaits!

houseRules.notes:
Somewhere to Stay Backpackers caters to International Travellers and International Students. As such we preference International guests and cater only to genuine travellers.

We may choose at management's discretion to accommodate Australian residents with a strict one week only policy. We do not accept bookings from local residents within the Greater Brisbane Area. Dormitory rooms are reserved for our International Guests Only.

International guests are required to provide a valid PASSPORT as identification and credit card details at Check-In.  Australian residents are required to provide valid photo identification and credit card details at Check-in.

Somewhere To Stay Backpackers Hostel will not accept any guests under the age of 18. 

Payment in advance is required for all reservations. 

We accept payment by way of CASH (AUD), EFTPOS, VISA or MASTERCARD. Surcharge fees apply to card transactions.

All rates are subject to change.

Guests shall pay all sums due upon checking-in including a $20 deposit. The Deposit will be held for the duration of stay, to cover loss/damages to the Hostel, linen and cleaning costs.

Guests cancelling more than 24 hours prior to 2pm on the scheduled date of arrival will be not be charged for cancellation fees. 

Guests cancelling within 24 hours prior to 2pm on the scheduled date of arrival will incur a cancellation fee equal to one night's accommodation for each bed booked at the quoted rate. 

Failure to arrive at the Hostel on the scheduled date or advise of a cancellation, will result in the charge of a NO SHOW fee equal to one night's accommodation for each bed booked at the quoted rate. This will be charged to the method of payment advised at the time of booking.  The remainder of your booking will be cancelled at this time. 
  
All cancellation and NO SHOW charges will be processed using the credit card used to make the booking.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
